Condition-Input.description: WHERE clause condition that can be combined with others.
Condition-Input.title: Condition

Condition-Output.description: WHERE clause condition that can be combined with others.
Condition-Output.title: Condition

ContentReasoning.description:
Reasoning content.

See the specification for [thinking blocks](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/build-with-claude/extended-thinking#understanding-thinking-blocks) for Claude models.
ContentReasoning.title: ContentReasoning

DocumentCitation.description: A citation that refers to a page range in a document.
DocumentCitation.title: DocumentCitation

DocumentRange.description: A range specifying a section of a document.
DocumentRange.title: DocumentRange

Error.description: Scan error (runtime error which occurred during scan).
Error.title: Error

JsonChange.description: Describes a change to data using JSON Patch format.
JsonChange.title: JsonChange

LoggerEvent.description: Log message recorded with Python logger.
LoggerEvent.title: LoggerEvent

Logprobs.description: Log probability information for a completion choice.
Logprobs.title: Logprobs

ProvenanceData.description: Metadata about who made an edit and why.
ProvenanceData.title: ProvenanceData

ResponseSchema.description: Schema for model response when using Structured Output.
ResponseSchema.title: ResponseSchema

SampleLimitEvent.description: The sample was unable to finish processing due to a limit
SampleLimitEvent.title: SampleLimitEvent

ScoreEdit.description: A single edit to a score.
ScoreEdit.title: ScoreEdit

ScoreEditEvent.description: Event recorded when a score is edited.
ScoreEditEvent.title: ScoreEditEvent

ScoreEvent.description:
Event with score.

Can be the final score for a `Sample`, or can be an intermediate score
resulting from a call to `score`.
ScoreEvent.title: ScoreEvent

SpanBeginEvent.description: Mark the beginning of a transcript span.
SpanBeginEvent.title: SpanBeginEvent

SpanEndEvent.description: Mark the end of a transcript span.
SpanEndEvent.title: SpanEndEvent

StepEvent.description: Step within current sample or subtask.
StepEvent.title: StepEvent

StoreEvent.description: Change to data within the current `Store`.
StoreEvent.title: StoreEvent

ToolCallContent.description: Content to include in tool call view.
ToolCallContent.title: ToolCallContent

ToolCallView.description:
Custom view of a tool call.

Both `context` and `call` are optional. If `call` is not specified
then the view will default to a syntax highlighted Python function call.
ToolCallView.title: ToolCallView

ToolInfo.description:
Specification of a tool (JSON Schema compatible)

If you are implementing a ModelAPI, most LLM libraries can
be passed this object (dumped to a dict) directly as a function
specification. For example, in the OpenAI provider:

```python
ChatCompletionToolParam(
    type="function",
    function=tool.model_dump(exclude_none=True),
)
```

In some cases the field names don't match up exactly. In that case
call `model_dump()` on the `parameters` field. For example, in the
Anthropic provider:

```python
ToolParam(
    name=tool.name,
    description=tool.description,
    input_schema=tool.parameters.model_dump(exclude_none=True),
)
```
ToolInfo.title: ToolInfo

ToolParams.description: Description of tool parameters object in JSON Schema format.
ToolParams.title: ToolParams

TopLogprob.description: List of the most likely tokens and their log probability, at this token position.
TopLogprob.title: TopLogprob

Transcript.description: Transcript info and transcript content (messages and events).
Transcript.title: Transcript

UrlCitation.description: A citation that refers to a URL.
UrlCitation.title: UrlCitation

ValidationCase.description:
Validation case for comparing to scanner results.

A `ValidationCase` specifies the ground truth for a scan of particular id (e.g. transcript id, message id, etc.

Use `target` for single-value or dict validation.
Use `labels` for validating resultsets with label-specific expectations.
ValidationCase.title: ValidationCase

Worklist.description: List of transcript ids to process for a scanner.
Worklist.title: Worklist

get.description: Returns app config including transcripts and scans directories.

post.description: Returns scans from the results directory. Optional filter condition uses SQL-like DSL. Optional order_by for sorting results. Optional pagination for cursor-based pagination.

get.description: Returns detailed status and metadata for a single scan.
Streams scanner results as Arrow IPC format with LZ4 compression. Excludes input column for efficiency; use the input endpoint for input text.
get.summary: Get scanner dataframe containing results for all transcripts

get.description: Returns the original input text for a specific scanner result. The input type is returned in the X-Input-Type response header.

parameters.description: UUID of the specific result row
parameters.name: uuid

schema.description: UUID of the specific result row
schema.title: Uuid

get.summary: Get scanner input for a specific transcript

post.description: Returns transcripts from specified directory. Optional filter condition uses SQL-like DSL. Optional order_by for sorting results. Optional pagination for cursor-based pagination.

get.description: Returns a single transcript with full content (messages and events).
